data.actual_result: The sending process is being interrupted and the file won't send
data.expected_result: The sending process won't be interrupted
data.short_description: When using the "new" share option on Android and sending it to a channel / someone and tilting the screen the sending process will stop
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your gallery - pick an image or a video - hold press the image or the video - choose share - pick discord - send it to a channel - tilt your screen
